channel.title: Adding Vote4Cash - MYSQL PHP ERROR
channel.description:
Hey, I don't know where to post this so I thought I would post it here. I get this error in phpmyadmin
SQL query:
<?php /** * @author Stuart <RogueX | iVariable> * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost");
MySQL said: Documentation #1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '<?php
define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost")' at line 1
